author: senh
title: Best Caribbean Destination for Adventure
text: BING NEWS: 2nd Dominican city ready to be a top Caribbean tourism destination Puerto Plata.- Santiago Tourism Destination Cluster president Ramon Paulino on Monday said the province´s strategic tourism development plan is ready to implement in the coming months.
